actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that amounts received under certain tuition remission programs will be exempt from taxation.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude amounts received under certain tuition remission programs from gross income.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that amounts received under certain tuition remission programs will be exempt from taxation.
